bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Electric Penetration Assemblies in Containment Structures for Nuclear Power Generating Stations
IEEE Standard for Electric Penetration Assemblies in Containment Structures for Nuclear Power Generating Stations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard prescribes the mechanical, electrical, and test requirements for the design, construction, and installation of electric penetration assemblies in containment structures for stationary nuclear power generating stations. The electric conductor and insulation characteristics of external circuits which connect to penetration assemblies are beyond the scope of these criteria. If there should be any conflict between this standard and those documents referenced herein, this standard shall take precedence over the referenced documents.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
